job description:
Apex Life Sciences has an exciting opportunity for a Scientist with one of our Chemical clients located near King of Prussia, Pennsylvania.

The Scientist will be responsible for leading the execution of laboratory work for new and reformulation of products and product lines.

Responsibilities:
  • Conduct research in the areas of formulation modifications and potential new product development
  • Develop new applications or customize existing applications to meet specific scientific project needs
  • Summarize and communicate data results to the broader technology team and recommend new systems and processes to improve operations
  • Document all work product in a clear and logical manner using standard scientific reports
  • Provide input into quality control testing protocols as necessary
Requirements:
  • Bachelor of Science degree in Chemistry or Science related field.
  • Minimum of 2 years of industry experience with formulations.
  • Asphalt, acrylic, moisture cure coatings, adhesives, sealants, etc.
  • Must have experience with TGA and DSC.
